name: Totem (itch) (kevinjacob10)
description:
Town folk say a monster roams the halls of that old manor in the hills… They say that long ago it near slaughtered all the settlers of these lands. Those that escaped its claws went mad at the sight of it. You hadn’t paid heed to such stories; such folk tales are rarely trustworthy. But today, you live this nightmare.

Totem is a 2D Horror Game. You battle for your sanity as you move through the corridors haunted by the monster.  

(The game was made in four days)

Credits:

Kevin Jacob Stanly (Lead Programmer, Designer)

Albert Ojapalo (Level Designer, Programmer)

Chris Thompson (Sounds Designer)

Connor Dobbin (Programmer, Narrative Design)

Kai Zhuang (Technical Artist)

Lucas Gollan (2D Artist, Narrative Design)

Yimming Li (Level Designer)
